metadata.title: CVE-2021-21212 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Network Config UI in Google Chrome on ChromeOSprior to 90.0.4430.72 allowed a remote attacker to potentially compromiseWiFi connection security via a malicious WAP.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
